long_description: The STM Studio Case carries and protects your iPad Air, and features a distinctive magnetic closure and folding system that snaps the case into the perfect viewing and typing positions. Patent-pending magnetic closure provides quick and easy access. Snap-in, hard-shell bracket with soft lining helps protect your device from scratches and bumps. Lightweight and slim construction offers comfortable and easy carrying. Case has easy access to device ports and control buttons. The STM Studio Case has a foldable front cover for both typing and viewing modes.
short_description: The STM Studio Case carries and protects your iPad Air, and features a distinctive magnetic closure and folding system that snaps the case into the perfect viewing and typing positions.
